name: Pineapple sunset
description:
welcome to the a e s t h e t i c

*EPILEPSY WARNING: LOTS OF FLASHING LIGHTS

An interactive music video experience. There are hidden pineapples you can collect by clicking on them

*may or may not be 42 pineapples*

Made in 48 hours for GGS Sun's Out Jam 2020. Theme was "Pineapple"

made my John Ledesma  & Li Baum

Music - Wake Up - Timeless by Desired

https://neoncityrecords.bandcamp.com/album/timeless

Open source 3D Models

Made with Unity
